special.desc: Every 5.5 seconds, a random Anima Squad champion fires Gatling Bunny-Guns in a long cone, dealing high physical damage.

special.desc: Every 5 seconds, a random Anima Squad champion fires Searing Shortbow, shooting an arrow that leaves an area that deals magic damage over time.

special.name: Vortex Glove
special.desc: Every 5 seconds, a random Anima Squad champion fires piercing orbs from Vortex Glove, that deal magic damage, reduced for each enemy struck.

special.name: Guiding Hex

special.name: Blade-o-rang
special.desc: Every 4 seconds, a random Anima Squad champion throws a returning Blade-o-rang that deals physical damage, increased for the first target hit.
